incidents.name: Super SIM Network Connectivity Issues

incident_updates.body: We are now seeing full recovery, this incident has now been resolved.

We are continuing to observe data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. This recent impact is limited to devices connected over one provider in the US. About 5% of devices may still experience connectivity issues. Our engineering team is actively working alongside the affected network provider to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. In the meantime, we kindly suggest that customers reset the connectivity through the console or through the APIs (by reactivating SIMs) if they notice that some of their SIM cards are still experiencing issues. This can often help re-establish a stable connection for the affected devices. We will provide another update in 4 hours or sooner as soon as we have more information available.

We are continuing to observe data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Our engineering team is actively working with the affected network provider to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

Beginning at 04:58 UTC, we observed ~11.57% of data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. Our engineering team is actively working with the affected network provider to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Twilio Whatsapp Cloud API and Verify Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Whatsapp Cloud API and Verify were degraded for 23 minutes between 17:11 and 17:34 Pacific Time on 06/04/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced rate limit errors (63018). The issue has now been resolved

incidents.name: Missing Subscriptions From Event Streams API

incident_updates.body: Event Streams API and console are working normally. All existing subscriptions are now returned. This incident has been resolved.

Event Streams API and console are working normally. All existing subscriptions are now returned. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Event Streams subscriptions created during or before 2022 are not returned to the API, CLI or console since May 12th 2024. Event Streams engineers are working to mitigate the issue. incidents.name: Super SIM Network Connectivity Issues

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing connectivity issues on Super SIM. We kindly suggest that customers reset the connectivity through the console or APIs (by re-activating devices) if they notice any SIM cards still experiencing issues. This can often help re-establish a stable connection for the affected devices. This incident has been resolved.

Currently, we are monitoring the situation as approximately 1% of devices may still experience connectivity issues. The offending node has been removed from the network, and there are no failures from our systems. We kindly suggest that customers reset the connectivity through the console or APIs (by re-activating devices) if they notice any SIM cards still experiencing issues. This can often help re-establish a stable connection for the affected devices. We will provide another update in 2 hours, or sooner, as more information becomes available.

Beginning at 17:05 UTC, we observed ~3% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. Our engineering team is actively working with the affected network provider to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Voice Intelligence May Be Experiencing Delays Processing Their Transcriptions When Using Sentiment Analysis or Summarisation Features

incident_updates.body: All requests have now been reprocessed, and Voice Intelligence is operating normally at this time. This incident is resolved.

New Voice Intelligence requests that utilise Summarisation and Sentiment features are now being successfully processed.
Engineering team are working to redrive requests that could not be processed earlier. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Super SIM Network Connectivity Issues

incident_updates.body: Network connectivity issues with Super SIM has been resolved and Super SIM is operating normally at this time.

We have observed that the recent impact was limited to devices connected over AT&T. Currently, we are still monitoring the situation as approximately 5% of devices may still experience connectivity issues. Our engineering team is actively working alongside the affected network provider to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. In the meantime, we kindly suggest that customers reset the connectivity through the console or through the APIs (by reactivating SIMs) if they notice that some of their SIM cards are still experiencing issues. This can often help re-establish a stable connection for the affected devices. We will provide another update in 4 hours or sooner as soon as we have more information available.

We have observed that the recent impact was limited to devices connected over AT&T. Currently, we are still monitoring the situation as approximately 5% of devices may still experience connectivity issues. Our engineering team is actively working alongside the affected network provider to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. In the meantime, we kindly suggest that customers reset the connectivity through the console or through the APIs (by reactivating SIMs) if they notice that some of their SIM cards are still experiencing issues. This can often help re-establish a stable connection for the affected devices. We will provide another update in 4 hours or sooner as soon as we have more information available.

Beginning at 5:20 AM UTC, we observed about 10% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. We are continuing to work on identifying and resolving the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

Beginning at 5:20 AM UTC, we observed about 10% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. We are actively working to identify and resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Some New UK Customers Are Unable to Provision Phone Numbers to Their Trial Account Using the Get Phone Number Button via the SMS Onboarding Tutorial

incident_updates.body: Provisioning a phone number to new trial account by using Get phone number button via the SMS onboarding tutorial is now operating normally. This issue has been resolved.

Provisioning a phone number to new trial account by using Get phone number button via the SMS onboarding tutorial is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. Well provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified the issue affecting some new UK customers that are running into an error when trying to provision a phone number to their new trial account by using the button Get phone number via the SMS onboarding tutorial. The current workaround is to use the Buy a Number page in the Twilio Console. Our Engineers are continuing to work on a permanent fix. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
